QAs.question: Is this image showing an outdoor garden scene?
Does this image depict a residential kitchen?
Does this image show a sports facility?
Is this a photograph of industrial heating equipment or a boiler system?
Is there a visible pipe system in the image?
Is the insulation tube on some of the pipes covered in foil insulation too?
Are there any cylindrical tanks in the image?
Is there a pressure gauge present in the image?
Are the visible pipes without any insulation made of copper material?
Is the tank on the floor red in color?
Is the surface of the red object smooth?
Is the insulation tube layer of the pipes gray in color?
Is the red tank located near the center of the image?
Is the large gray tank positioned at the top of the image?
Is there a visible pipe with insulation tube running across the center of the image?
Is there a visible pipe with insulation tube running across the top of the image?
Are the copper pipes below the large white and green tank?
Is the gray tank in front of the tube-insulated pipes?
Is the black piping above the large white and green tank?
Is there a pressure gauge to the right of the large white and green tank?
Are there only three large tanks visible in the image?
Is there at least one electric motor in the image?
Is there more than one pressure gauge visible in the image?
Are there at least four visible uninsulated pipes in the image?
Is the red tank connected to the gray tank?
Is the gray tank connected to the large white and green tank through the pipe at the bottom of the image?
Are the copper pipes directly connected to the foil-insulated pipes?
Is the gray tank the only tank that does not have an attached pressure gauge?
Is there any visible number on the image?
Is this correct: there is the exact number '48.9' below the red point specifically referring to power consumption of the left tank?
Is this correct: there is the exact number '48.9' below the red point specifically referring to a temperature of the top of the left tank?
Is this correct: there is the exact number '4890' on the pressure gauge specifically indicating the pressure of the tank?
Is there any visible non-numerical text on the image?
Is this correct: there is the exact text 'FLIR' at the bottom left corner specifically referring to a thermal imaging brand?
Is this correct: there is the exact text 'FLIR' at the top of the tank specifically referring to the tank brand?
Is this correct: there is the exact text 'ELIR' at the bottom left corner specifically referring to a thermal imaging brand?
Is there any color-to-temperature scale bar on the image?
Is the following sequence of colors correctly representing temperature distribution from low to high: black, blue, purple, orange, yellow, white?
Is the following sequence of colors correctly representing temperature distribution from low to high: black, blue, purple, orange, white, yellow?
Is the following sequence of colors correctly representing temperature distribution from low to high: black, purple, blue, orange, yellow, white?
Is the thermal image viewpoint exactly the same as the RGB image viewpoint without any noticeable shift or zoom?
Is the thermal image viewpoint slightly to the left of the RGB image viewpoint?
In the thermal image, should the heatmap be shifted downward to correctly match the positions of black edges of the objects?
In the thermal image, should the heatmap be zoomed out to correctly match the positions of black edges of the objects?
